        Get a list of all the calculations done so far by all users.
        Returns:
        List of all calculations - id, argument, userID
        Throws:
        WSException - when a database error occurs

      • CalculateBergerTable

        public java.util.List<BTResultRow> CalculateBergerTable(java.lang.Integer argument,
                                                        java.lang.String userName)
                                                 throws WSException,
                                                        MyException
        Calculate a berger table for a given amount of teams.
        Parameters:
        argument - argument to calculate BT for
        userName - name of the user asking for BT
        Returns:
        berger table in form of a list of rows
        Throws:
        WSException - when database error occurs
        MyException - when a wrong argument is passed

                                       throws MyException,
                                              WSException
        Get history of all used argments by a given user.
        Parameters:
        userName - of user to get history for
        Returns:
        list of all the arguments used by a given user
        Throws:
        MyException - when username is null
        WSException - when database error occurs

      • getResultList

        public java.util.List<ResultList> getResultList()
                                         throws WSException
        Get list of all already calculated results.
        Returns:
        List of Results - argument, #ofCalculatons, result in string form
        Throws:
        WSException - when database error occurs

      • getUserList

        public java.util.List<UserList> getUserList(java.lang.String userName)
                                     throws WSException,
                                            MyException
        Get a list of all the users.
        Parameters:
        userName - has to be admin, otherwise no permission
        Returns:
        list of all the users - ID, login, password, #ofCalculations
        Throws:
        WSException - when database error occurs
        MyException - when username is not "admin"

        Parameters:

        Register user in the DB.
        Parameters:
        login - login to be registered
        password - to the account
        Throws:
